gw.api.database

Class QueryHint

  • gw.api.database.QueryHint

  • public class QueryHint
    Adds a hint to a query. Note that a hint may not be used if it is added to the wrong containing object, e.g. an AfterSelect hint will not apply if added to the Table object returned by a join because there's no select because of the join. An AfterSelect hint will apply to a subselect, e.g. ... IN (SELECT ...). SQL Server: http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/ms187713.aspx - 3 places - Query: after the entire query string. - Join: inside the JOIN keywords. E.g. INNER LOOP JOIN - Table: after the join with the table. E.g. UPDATE MyTable WITH (TABLOCK). E.g. SELECT * FROM Table1 AS t1 INNER JOIN Table2 AS t2 WITH (FORCESEEK) ON t1.T2ID = t2.ID Oracle: http://docs.oracle.com/cd/B12037_01/server.101/b10752/hintsref.htm - Always in comments after the SELECT keyword: /*+ hint1 [text] hint2 [text] ...[[END COMMENT]] DB2: Hints work differently and are not added to the SQL H2: None

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      boolean Applicable
      Hook for each implementation to have a chance to decide whether they apply. Typically, each QueryOptimizer would check whether it is applicable for the current database type.
      java.lang.String PostText
      Text to append after all hints that use them
      java.lang.String PreText
      Text to prepend before all hints
      java.lang.String Separator
      Text to place between two hints that return true in isWrapped().

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void appendComment(java.lang.Appendable sqlBuilder)
      Append hint comment. Only called if shouldAppendComment() returns true.
      void appendHintAfterQuery(java.lang.Appendable sqlBuilder)
      Append hint text after the entire query String. Only called if shouldAppendAfterQuery() returns true.
      void appendHintAfterSelect(java.lang.Appendable sqlBuilder)
      Append hint text after the SELECT keyword. Only called if shouldAppendAfterSelect() returns true.
      void appendHintAfterTable(java.lang.Appendable sqlBuilder)
      Append hint text after the table in the FROM or JOIN clause. Only called if shouldAppendAfterTable() returns true.
      void appendHintInJoin(java.lang.Appendable sqlBuilder)
      Append hint text inside the JOIN clause. Only called if shouldAppendInJoin() returns true.
      boolean shouldAppendAfterQuery()
      boolean shouldAppendAfterSelect()
      boolean shouldAppendAfterTable()
      boolean shouldAppendComment()
      boolean shouldAppendInJoin()

      • shouldAppendAfterQuery

        boolean shouldAppendAfterQuery()
        Returns:
        true if this hint should be appended after the entire query String

      • shouldAppendAfterSelect

        boolean shouldAppendAfterSelect()
        Returns:
        true if this hint should be appended after the SELECT keyword. Note that this hint has no effect if applied to the Table object returned by a join.

      • shouldAppendAfterTable

        boolean shouldAppendAfterTable()
        Returns:
        true if this hint should be appended after the table in the FROM or JOIN clause.

      • shouldAppendComment

        boolean shouldAppendComment()
        Returns:
        true if this hint has a comment to add to the query

      • shouldAppendInJoin

        boolean shouldAppendInJoin()
        Returns:
        true if this hint should be appended in the JOIN clause.
